scripts.inline: npm run csstag && npm run jstag && cat public/index.html | inline-source --root public > public/bundle.html && mv public/bundle.html public/index.html
scripts.minify: html-minifier --case-sensitive --collapse-boolean-attributes --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace --collapse-whitespace --html5 --remove-attribute-quotes --remove-comments --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --sort-attributes --sort-class-name public/index.html > public/minified.html && mv public/minified.html public/index.html
scripts.build: npm run theme && npm run clean && npm run compilecss && npm run compilejs && npm run inline && npm run minify
